name: The Village (itch) (Niteru)
description:
Relax and chill while try to survive on this mini game.

Objectives:

Gather Wood , Ore, and Stone to build many houses as posible.

Get Food and prevent your villagers to get murder by the rat.

Survive many days as posible with many house as posible.

This is a game concept. 

This game is open for changes.

 Suggestions will be listen.
